metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1175 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Improper neutralization of user input in GitLab CE/EE versions 14.4 before14.7.7, all versions starting from 14.8 before 14.8.5, all versionsstarting from 14.9 before 14.9.2 allowed an attacker to exploit XSS byinjecting HTML in notes.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
